motd:
This build introduces a long requested new feature, grid view support for Radarr and Sonarr's catalogues! Grid view support for Lidarr will come in a future release.

This build also aligns Lidarr's add options UI with Radarr and Sonarr, and fixes a bug that prevented searches from triggering when adding new content in Radarr.

changes: (Add) Long-press result tile to view Discogs page
(Add) Align add options UI to Sonarr and Radarr
(TLS) Ability to enable TLS certificate validation
(Configuration) Ability to set default view for Radarr and Sonarr catalogue
(Search Bar) Expand catalogue search bar on focus in Radarr and Sonarr
(Drawer) Add more padding to drawer module tiles
(Drawer) Use the primary colour as the background colour
(Add) Would not trigger a search for missing movie when selected
(Add) Removed ability to set PreDB or TBA minimum availability
(Edit) Removed ability to set PreDB or TBA minimum availability
(Missing) Air date would show in days for very old content
